title: Status executor
description: Show migration status and dependency information for SurrealDB

module.description: Show status for specific module by name (e.g., 'auth'), number (e.g., 10), full directory name (e.g., '010_auth'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '010,020,auth')

filename.description: Show status for specific migration file by number (e.g., 1), name (e.g., 'auth'), full filename (e.g., '0001_authentication_up.surql'), or comma-separated list (e.g., '1,2,auth')

envFile.description: Path to environment file relative to workspace root

configPath.description: Path to configuration file (config.json or config.yaml)

detailed.description: Show detailed migration information including file names and checksums

json.description: Output status information in JSON format

debug.description: Show debug information about migration records and database queries
